name: First Northwest Bancorp
description: First Northwest Bancorp is the holding company for First Federal Savings and Loan Association of Port Angeles, offering a range of banking and financial services. Founded in 1923, the company has a rich history of serving communities in the Pacific Northwest, focusing on providing personalized banking solutions to individuals and businesses. First Northwest Bancorp provides a variety of financial products, including personal and business checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The bank prides itself on community involvement and customer service, aiming to foster long-term relationships with its clients. Through its commitment to community development and support, First Northwest Bancorp plays a vital role in local economies by offering accessible financial services that empower customers to achieve their financial goals. The company is dedicated to maintaining strong capital ratios and ensuring the safety and soundness of its operations while pursuing sustainable growth. With a focus on innovation and adapting to changing market conditions, First Northwest Bancorp continues to enhance its service offerings and technological capabilities to better serve its customers.

seo.meta_title: First Northwest Bancorp | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore First Northwest Bancorp, a community-focused bank offering a range of personal and business financial services in the Pacific Northwest.

faq.question: What services does First Northwest Bancorp provide?
faq.answer: First Northwest Bancorp offers personal and business banking services, which include checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First Northwest Bancorp?
faq.answer: Gregory M. O’Brien is the CEO of First Northwest Bancorp.

faq.question: Where is First Northwest Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: First Northwest Bancorp is headquartered in Port Angeles, Washington, USA.

faq.question: When was First Northwest Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: First Northwest Bancorp was founded in 1923.
